15 Mike Gray

Position DE

Class Redshirt Senior

Hometown Cincinnati, Ohio

Highschool Sycamore

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2016 (R-Senior)

• Conducted undergraduate research through UD's Summer Undergraduate Research Experience (SURE) Program on two projects: "Impeller Power Draw in Liquid-Solid Suspensions" and "Laser Induced Flourescence Characterization of Static Mixer Blending Performance"

• Started all 11 games for the Flyers at defensive end

• Recorded 41 tackles, with 26 being solo

• Led team in tackles for loss at 13, eight being sacks

• Eight quarterback hurries

• Named to Second Team All-Academic PFL for the second consecutive year.

2015 (R-Junior)

• Started at defensive end for the Flyers, totaling 38 tackles, 4 for loss, and 1.5 sacks

• Named Second Team All-Academic PFL

• Named an Arthur Ashe Sports Scholar

• Named to the 2015 PFL Academic Honor Roll for the fourth straight year

• Will return for the 2016 season

2014 (R-Sophomore)

• One of the primary backups at linebacker for the Flyers in 2014

• Member of the PFL Academic Honor Roll for the third consecutive season

2013 (R-Freshman)

• Appeared in five games for the Flyers in 2013

• Named to the 2013 PFL Academic Honor Roll, and was an Arthur Ashe Sports Scholar

2012 (Freshman - Redshirted)

• Sidelined due to redshirting for the Flyers during the 2012 season

• Member of the 2012 PFL Academic Honor Roll

Personal

• Son of Michael and Angela Gray

• Born on February 21, 1994

• Majoring in Chemical Engineering

• Gray was a standout at the Under Armor combine in 2011, registering a 4.6 40-yard dash time
